channel.title: Some things i need help with
channel.description:
The source im using is: Solitude
I want to get the "Donator Point Shop" to donator isle but i cant find it... How can i find the position of the NPC. His shop number is 23 idk if that matters tho... EDIT: Ok lets do it this way... How do i change a normal shop to a Donator Point Shop? EDIT: I FIXED IT.
Also i want to change "Bank of Solitude" To "Bank of ******" Secret for now ;P If you dont understand what i mean is the name when you open the bank. EDIT: I fixed it :P
//Quackie

item.title: Some things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Quackie Quackie
item.description:
@Quackie wrote:

I know where Keli is -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Some things i need help with

item.title: Some things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @black_guy42 black guy42
item.description:
@black_guy42 wrote:

[quote=“Quackie, post:9, topic:443325”]The one i want to change is named “Lady Keli”

There is one that uses Donation points but i dont know the coords or name of it…[/quote]

dude go into server/src/data/cfg. open up spawnconfig.cfg and ctrl+h “919”(which is lady keli) then next to it are the coords x(####) then y(####) change the #'s to whatever coords you want them to respawn on, very simple

for example mine is like this for keli :spawn = 919 2037 4540
2037 is x coords
4540 is y coords

except im not using 317 plus im on (pi) so it might be different frmo yours

Read full topic

item.source: Some things i need help with

item.title: Some things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

npcpawns.cfg or spawns.cfg or spawn-config.cfg (look around the cfg folder) in your cfg folder which should be located in data.
If you’re using eclipse: Ctrl + H, first tab (file search)
Search for “Solitude” and if you find the string that matches “Bank of solitude” replace it with what you want.

Read full topic
